author: andschwa
body: When the Pester tests were invoked over PSRP and the environment was more pristine than a local client, the lack of a "foo" variable in some scope caused the Pester test suite to emit an error at the end, failing the PSRP build. Removing the Clear-Variable directive eliminates this error, and is not necessary for the Pester test itself. /cc @paulcallen @JamesWTruher --- This change is [](https://reviewable.io/reviews/powershell/powershell/881)
title: Fix clear variable test
